name: Reidoth

personality.speech: Doesn't use two words when one will do. Direct. No flowery language.
personality.mannerisms: Watches birds, checks plants, speaks to animals more than people

emerald_enclave: Wilderness survivalists preserving natural order. Root out threats. Help others survive perils of wilds.
knowledge: Knows every inch of region. Can provide directions to Cragmaw Castle or Wave Echo Cave.
current_concern: Young green dragon Venomfang moved into Thundertree tower (area 7). Threatens delicate balance.
deal: Will guide party to Wave Echo Cave IF they drive off Venomfang. Won't enter mine himself.

warnings.spiders: Giant spiders lurk in ruins at base of hill
warnings.cultists: 'Folk in black masks and cloaks' skulking around (area 13)

tactics: If attacked, wildshapes into gray squirrel, escapes through crack in wall, waits for hostiles to leave
recruitment: If party drives off Venomfang, approaches members who exemplify protecting natural order. Offers Emerald Enclave membership, title 'Springwarden'.
